text: B16 melanoma cells were injected subcutaneously [ 5x105 tumor cells in 0.1 ml Phosphate buffered saline ( PBS ) / animal ] using a 27 G needle into the right - lower flanks of the carrier mice as previously described [ 54 ] .
The body weights and tumor volumes of the animals were monitored twice weekly .
The tumor volumes were measured with Vernier calipers and calculated using the following formula : ( AxB2 ) / 2 , where A is the larger and B is the smaller of the two dimensions .
At the end of the experiment , the animals were sacrificed .
The tumors were separated from the surrounding muscles and dermis .
